title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 11.41 - Entry level qualifications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 11.41 - Entry level qualifications

State Regulations
A public health nurse 1 must possess a baccalaureate degree in nursing from a regionally accredited or New York State-registered college or university, as well as licensure and current registration to practice as a registered professional nurse in New York State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
11.41

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
